title: MAKING FORGED OR PRESSED METAL PRODUCTS, e.g. HORSE-SHOES, RIVETS, BOLTS OR WHEELS  (making particular articles by working sheet metal without essentially removing material B21D; processing wire B21F; making pins, needles or nails B21G; making particular articles by rolling B21H; forging machines, pressing machines, hammering machines, in general B21J; making chains B21L; plating B23K)
informative_references: General metal forging or pressing methods not dedicated to the manufacture of a specific product; Metal forging or pressing devices and furnacesProducts per se obtainable by forging, e.g. pistons, rocking arms, etc. ,
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of specific products; Devices for handling, heating or cooling, controlling forging hammers or presses.

title: Making machine elements
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of machine elements.

title: balls, rolls, or rollers, e.g. for bearings
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of balls, rolls or rollers, e.g. for bearings. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: {of bullets}
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of bullets. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: ball-races {or sliding bearing races}
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of ball races. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: cages for bearings
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of cages for bearings. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: axles or shafts
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of axles or shafts.

title: crankshafts
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of crankshafts. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of axles or shafts of cylindrical form. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: of specially-shaped cross-section
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of axles or shafts of special cross-section. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of fittings, e.g. lubricant fittings. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

informative_references: Joints, sealing for fuel injectionJoints or fitting for pipes -
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of parts of pipe or hose couplings. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of pistons or plungers. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of valve parts. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of rocker arms. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of poppet valves, e.g. for internal combustion engines. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of valve bodies or valve seats. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of housings or supporting parts, e.g. axle housings or engine mountings. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: wheels; discs
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of wheels or disks.

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of wheels or disks with gear teeth. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of disks, e.g. disc wheels. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of wheels with spokes. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of disks with blades. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: rims; tyres
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of rims or tyres. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of hubs. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: pulleys, e.g. cable pulleys
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of pulley, e.g. cable pulleys. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: bolts, studs, or the like  (making screw-thread B21K1/56; making U-bolts B21K1/74)
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of bolts studs, or the like.

title: with heads
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of heads on bolts studs, or the like. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: {with recessed heads}
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of bolts studs, or the like, with recessed heads. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: {Heading machines with an oscillating die block}
definition_statement: This place covers: Machines for forge-heading of bolts studs, or the like, and comprising an oscillating die block. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: Machines working with hammers, e.g. beating in a radial direction, for forming heads
definition_statement: This place covers: Machines for forging heads of bolts studs, or the like, and working with hammers, e.g. beating in a radial direction.

title: Trimming or shearing formed heads, e.g. working with dies
informative_references: Trimming by using dies in general
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the trimming or shearing of formed heads, e.g. with working dies. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: double-ended, e.g. with heads on both ends  (forming heads B21K1/46)
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of double-ended bolts, studs or the like, e-g- with heads on both ends. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: with grooves or notches
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of bolts, studs, of the like, with grooves or notches. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: screw-threaded elements
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods for forming screw-threads. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of special rivets, e.g. with electrical contacts. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: Making hollow articles not covered by a single preceding sub-group  (essentially from sheet-metal or uniform thin-walled tubes B21D, e.g. B21D41/00, B21D51/00)

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of thick-walled hollow articles, e.g. projectiles. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: Shaping hollow articles with different cross-section in longitudinal direction, e.g. nozzles, spark-plugs
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of hollow articles with different cross-section, e.g. nozzles, spark-plugs. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of cone-shaped or bell-shaped articles, e.g. insulator caps. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the remodelling of hollow bodies with respect to the shape of their cross-section. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: Making other articles
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of articles not provided for in the groups   -  , especially thin articles worked in their thickness. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group: Source: EP0945199, WO2006008861.

title: members of endless tracks, e.g. track guides, shoes  (making from sheet-metal B21D)
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of members of endless tracks, e.g. track guides, shoes. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: flanged articles  (B21K1/28 takes precedence; flanging tubes B21D)
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to the manufacture of flanged articles. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: Uniting components to form integral members, e.g. turbine wheels and shafts, caulks with inserts, with or without shaping of the components  (uniting by interference- or press-fitting B23P11/02, B21K19/02)
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods for uniting components in order to form integral members, with or without shaping the components. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: {by friction heat forging  (B21J15/027 takes precedence; friction heat forging per se B21J5/063)}
definition_statement: This place covers: Metal forging or pressing methods dedicated to uniting components by friction heat forging. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: Handling devices, e.g. for feeding, aligning, discharging, Cutting-off means; Arrangement thereof
definition_statement: This place covers: Handling devices in relation to metal forging or pressing, for e.g. feeding, aligning, discharging, cutting off.

title: Feeding devices for rods, wire, or strips
definition_statement: This place covers: Devices for feeding rods, wires or strips into a forging machine. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: allowing successive working steps
definition_statement: This place covers: Devices for feeding and allowing successive working steps. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: Cutting-off means; Arrangements thereof
definition_statement: This place covers: Means for cutting-off forging material. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

title: Arrangements for heating or cooling during processing  (for preparing metal stock to be forged or pressed B21J1/06; heating equipment per se, see the appropriate classes, e.g. H05B)
informative_references: Heating processes before forgingHeating equipment per se
definition_statement: This place covers: Arrangements for heating or cooling during forging. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:

definition_statement: This place covers: Control devices specially adapted for positioning tool carriers. Illustrative examples of subject matter classified in this group:
